physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Marked pallor of the left optic nerve head; brain MRI shows wide infarcted area involving the territory of the left middle cerebral artery; abnormal electroencephalography tracings from the left hemisphere.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No vision in the left eye; persistence of optic disc pallor and absence of foveal reflex related to optic nerve atrophy at 9-month follow-up.
